document_data.name: Imir Castdie
document_data.mainbody: '''Imir Castdie''' was a [[hill giant]] member of the [[Zhentarim]] and the leader of the giant and humanoid forces based near [[Darkhold]], to which they held allegiance.
document_data.Description: Imir had a white head of hair, with a graying beard and arm hair. He typically wore the giant-sized [[plate mail]] armor that the Zhentarim provided him and his giant forces, though felt its required helmet was uncomfortable.
document_data.Personality: Imir was known to be smarter than the average hill giant and a hard drinker.
document_data.Relationship: Imir answered to and respected the [[Pereghost]], highly regarding his honesty and valor.. However, he secretly dreamed of one day commanding Darkhold himself.
